migration.name: kinoserver-001: create view for indexes
migration.runSQL: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_indexes AS SELECT t.relname as table_name, i.relname as index_name, a.attname as column_name FROM pg_class t, pg_class i, pg_index ix, pg_attribute a WHERE t.oid = ix.indrelid and i.oid = ix.indexrelid and a.attrelid = t.oid and a.attnum = ANY(ix.indkey) and t.relkind = 'r' and t.relname not like 'pg_%' ORDER BY t.relname, i.relname;
